subject: trackable courier service can offer Minnie
body:
When our knowing exceeds our sensing, we will no longer be deceived by the illusions of our senses.

We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

If we could sell our experience for what they cost us, we'd all be millionaires.

Unlike grown ups, children have little need to deceive themselves.

Luck is the idol of the idle.

They believe that nothing will happen because they have closed their doors.

There is no gilding of setting sun or glamour of poetry to light up the ferocious and endless toil of the farmers wives.

It is wise to learn it is God-like to create.

I believe in democracy, because it releases the energies of every human being.

It isn't by size that you win or fail -- be the best of whatever you are.

In faith and hope the world will disagree, But all mankind's concern is charity.

Good clothes open all doors.

You'll never find a better sparring partner than adversity.
